==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}} 
:'''Conjat:''' Will anyone really come visit this place...
:{{DIcon|!}} Is there anything of note nearby?
:;(If there are [[Magical Crystal Chunk|Magical Crystal Ore Veins]] Conjat knows; Version 1)
:::'''Conjat:''' Well, since you're asking... If you don't mind me being blunt, are you looking for ore?
:::'''Conjat:''' Someone mistook me for a researcher earlier and directed me toward a place full of [[Condessence Crystal]]s.
:::'''Conjat:''' No one really comes around here, but I can't exactly leave, either... So if you need to, you can check it out. It's just nearby, after all.
::;([[Rich Ore Reserve]] marked on the map)
:;(If there are [[Magical Crystal Chunk|Magical Crystal Ore Veins]] Conjat knows; Version 2)
:::'''Conjat:''' Well, since you're asking... If you don't mind me being blunt, are you looking for ore?
:::'''Conjat:''' Someone mistook me for a researcher earlier and directed me towards a place full of Condessence Crystals. There's even Magical Crystal Ore to be had there.
:::'''Conjat:''' No one really comes around here, but I can't exactly leave, either... So if you need to, you can check it out. It's just nearby, after all.
::;([[Rich Ore Reserve]] marked on the map)
:;(If there are no more [[Magical Crystal Chunk|Magical Crystal Ore Veins]] Conjat knows)
:::'''Conjat:''' Would you like to visit that floating [[Central Laboratory Ruins|Central Laboratory]]? If not... Then there's not a lot I have for you.
:{{DIcon}} About visitors... 
::'''Conjat:''' Hello, Honorary Senior Researcher. You mean, "What is there to even visit here"?
::'''Conjat:''' Well, if we want to get specific about potential attractions... I guess it would be the airborne Central Laboratory.
::'''Conjat:''' According to Messieurs [[Raimondo]] and [[Choiseul]], the institute will convert that laboratory into a Safety Exhibition.
::'''Conjat:''' Inside, there will be pictures from all the Institute's old research projects...
::'''Conjat:''' Though... I don't see what those projects have to do with a Safety Exhibition...
::'''Conjat:''' And would anyone want to visit such an exhibition...
::{{DIcon}} Is there anything else to visit around here?
:::'''Conjat:''' Monsieur Choiseul said the [[Academic Assembly Hall]] is going to be renovated and reopened to host regular exhibitions of the products Institute research.
:::'''Conjat:''' But all we have to show at the moment would be clockwork puppets like the Artificed Dancers...
:::'''Conjat:''' If nothing else, we can rebuild [[Mary-Ann Memorial Park]]. At least the scenery there is pretty nice...
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Conjat:''' Goodbye. I'd better get on with my work...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==

=== Etymology ===

* Conjat is the old occitan for {{Wt|comjat}}, which means "leave" or "permission to be absent".
